SELECT S.STOCK_CD, S.PRODUCT_CD, S.WH_LOC_IN_AREA_CD, S.STOCK_QTY, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.SIZE_DES, W.WH_NAME, W.WH_AREA, W.WH_LOC_IN_AREA FROM STOCK S JOIN PRODUCT P ON S.PRODUCT_CD = P.PRODUCT_CD JOIN WH_DETAIL W ON S.WH_LOC_IN_AREA_CD = W.WH_LOC_IN_AREA_CD
AND stock_cd LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND product_name LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND wh_name LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND wh_area LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND wh_loc_in_area LIKE '%${keyword}%'
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}
